Resources Access Questionnaire

This short questionnaire requests key information about your study and will help the ADRC best support you and your project. If you have any questions, please contact us at alz@uabmc.edu.

UAB Alzheimer's Disease Research Center, IRB Protocol 30000169

Specific Aims

ADRC Theme and Funding
The theme of the UAB ADRC is 'Deep South disparities in Alzheimer's disease and related dementias'
This includes disparities related to Black or African American race, medical comorbidities at higher prevalence in the Deep South, other geographic factors, etc. Studies falling under this theme are desirable, although direct connection to this theme is not required for all studies using ADRC resources.

Field Label:
Protocol revisions are required and must be approved by the IRB
  • Revisions have been submitted
  • Final revisions approved
  • PI informed of approval and resource delivery process initiated
Note, this may be an on-going process; protocol revisions at all sites must be approved before resource distribution
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, <font style="font-size: 125%">Protocol revisions sent to IRB | 2, Final protocol revisions approved | 3, PI informed of approval

Field Label: Notes on protocol revisions and IRB approvals

A schedule of delivery should be established for the resources and the resources should be verified with the PI based on the Executive Committee decision This applies to both appropriate ADRC cores (e.g. Data, Neuroimaging) as well as affiliate biospecimen stores (e.g. SPAN)
  • Verification of resources to be provided with the PI
  • Determine whether resources are delivered once or on a regular schedule
  • Establish delivery schedule estimate with ADRC cores
  • Set delivery with affiliate banks
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, <font style="font-size:125%">Requested resources verified with PI | 2, Determine whether delivery is once or will be done regularly over the course of a study | 3, Set delivery of resources from ADRC cores | 4, Set schedule with outside labs and banks

Field Label: Notes on scheduling of ADRC resources

All requested resources should be delivered or regular delivery established
  • Datasets should be curated along with data dictionaries
  • Phyical resources shipped from Cores or affiliate specimen banks
  • For repeated deliveries, this should be continued as needed
After initial delivery, receipt of resources should be verified with the PI; at this stage the request can be closed Verification of continued delivery should be handled by the appropriate ADRC staff and the PI
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, <font style="font-size:125%">Datasets pulled and delived to the PI | 2, Physical specimens sent to PI | 3, Repeated specimens established | 4, PI contacted and receipt of all data and physical resources verfied

Field Label: Notes on delivery of requested resources
